body_html:
You are right, my mistake, the first time when I tried, the max index is 0, so it both return 0.
it seems that if we use slice , the index location return bytorch.max is always 0,
I gusess the reason may comes from that when you use slice, the storage of the Tensor is the same as original, while the stride change to 10, see c code here

body:
You are right, my mistake, the first time when I tried,  the max index is 0, so it both return 0.
it seems that if we use slice , the index location return by`torch.max` is always `0`,
I gusess the reason  may comes from that when you use slice, the `storage` of the Tensor is the same as original, while the `stride` change to 10, see [c code here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/TH/generic/THTensorMath.c#L1521)
